Text.Language: Cenat~so n~nesv/ri t/rou: n~ceso m~pew~ou: p~sousou n~niparyenoc t/rou: Maria ][rompi eynecwc:
Many are all your wonders, and precious is your glory / the pride of all virgins, O Mary, the fair dove.
